data.title: Bird & Bird Advokatpartnerselskab
data.text:
‘The unparalleled experience of the team within IT law, combined with a truly business-minded and commercially reasonable approach, makes this team unique.’

‘Lau Normann Jorgensen is one of the grand men in the Danish IT law environment, and his skills and knowledge within this area of the law is second to none.’

‘Jan Ussing Andersen is a very efficient and experienced subject-matter expert within IT-contract law. A good sense of humor and good communication skills adds value to negotiations (particularly the difficult ones).’

‘We have always received a perfect service. The team is responsive to requests from us, and they have great knowledge of the IT industry and M&A transactions.’

‘Lau Norman Jorgensen is service-minded and knows our industry.’

‘Morten Rosenmejer, who leads Bird & Bird Advokatpartnerselskab’s M&A group, is easy to work with and always tries to find solutions.’

‘Service minded and understand how to keep a good relationship to clients.’

‘A solution-oriented approach, working at the speed of business needs, and bringing in global best practices and local aspects makes Bird & Bird unique. They would also rate very high on collaboration, considering the unique deals we have been working together on.’

‘Being available all the time, Listening and giving advice as subject matter experts, and speed to action makes them stand out.’

‘The team at Two Birds is outstanding. We relied on Mette Jakobsen and her team for their significant experience in M&A transactions along with extensive knowledge of local laws, regulations, and customary terms and practices. Regardless of the specific functional area in question, we could always rely on the Two Birds team to bring the appropriate specialist to the table to assist in whatever topic was in question. In terms of responsiveness and overall professionalism, the Two Birds team is a pleasure to work with.’

‘In particular, Mette Jakobsen has been my main point of contact at the firm. Mette has a wonderful demeanor, positive attitude, and willingness to push through obstacles to get us to the finish line. Her technical expertise and extensive M&A experience are great attributes, but Mette’s commercial/pragmatic approach to dealmaking and level-headed advice throughout the transaction are truly top notch. On a personal side, I have really enjoyed working with Mette as her overall approach and personality fit well with my style and desire to have some fun and enjoy the journey along the way! I would 100% recommend Mette to anyone looking to complete a M&A transaction in the Nordic region.’

‘Mette Mernø Hans Jakobsen balances pragmatism with top-notch legal expertise. She ensures that all details are managed without losing sight of the bigger picture. She is highly available and responsive.’

‘Compared to what we have experienced earlier we believe Bird & Bird act as a true team – they are super individual specialists but understand to support each other as a team in order for us to experience a holistic approach to the tasks we are addressing together.’

‘Michael Gorm Madsen is our primary contact. He is outstanding in the GDPR and privacy area, and always goes that extra mile for us.’

‘The team combined has excellent knowledge on the subject, and they are always available.’

‘Their great knowledge combined with practical solutions makes them stand out from other law firms.’

‘Bird & Bird was recommended to us as a competent partner dealing with legal issues in relation to the use of cloud technology.’

‘Bird & Bird’s ability to combine the possible implications of information technology, organisational needs and EU regulation is unique.’

‘Michael Gorm Madsen was our prime partner. His knowledge and skills are outstanding and ensured progress and a result. Besides his professional abilities, his personal integrity and ability so see the world from the customer’s perspective ensured the outcome.’

‘Morten Nissen has extensive experience in Denmark and across Europe.’

‘Morten Nissen is a long time expert who has practised in Brussels for many years and now in Denmark for almost 10 years. ’

‘Morten Nissen is a non-traditional competition lawyer. He is good at seeing possible new angles.’

‘They have outstanding knowledge on the subject which they are able to break down into understandable language.’

‘The lawyers are nice to work with and they can help come up with simple solutions to complex problems.’

‘B&B has a strong procurement team led by Peter Dann Jørgensen. Peter has a very strong tender law profile in the industry and is known for his great knowledge of and insight into tender law matters. At the same time, he is very pragmatic and solution-oriented in his approach. It is a pleasure to work with him, including brainstorming about possible solutions that are not straightforward.’
